% We don't test multiple job names in the same test because bibtopic uses the
% fixed name btaux.aux for it's master file.
%!TeX check = bibtex -version
\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{bibtopic}

\begin{document}

\bibliographystyle{alpha}

Some random citations: \cite{Angle:2003},
\cite{Kilroy:1942} and \cite{Butron:1891}.

\begin{btSect}{foo}
 \section{References from foo}
 \btPrintCited
\end{btSect}

\begin{btSect}[plain]{bar}
 \section{References from bar}
 \btPrintCited
 \section{Articles not cited}
 \btPrintNotCited
\end{btSect}

\begin{btSect}[plain]{foo,bar}
 \section{All References}
 \btPrintAll
\end{btSect}

\end{document}
